title: (Alteration of Name and Department and Title of Minister) Order 2023 (S.I. No.
heading: 5. Article 5 of the Principal Order is amended by the substitution of the
text_raw:
5. Article 5 of the Principal Order is amended by the substitution of the 

following paragraph (3): 

“(3) The number of persons to be appointed to be members of a 
regional assembly by a constituent local authority shall be as 
follows: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

in the case of the council of the city of Dublin, 7, 

in the case of the council of the county of Cork, 5, 

in the case of the council of the city and county of Limerick, 
4, one of whom will be the Mayor, 

in the case of the councils the counties of Donegal, Dun 
Laoghaire-Rathdown, Fingal, Galway, Kerry, Kildare, 
Mayo, Meath, South Dublin, Tipperary and Wexford, 3 
each, and 

(e) 

in every other case, 2 each.” 

Amendment of Article 60 of Principal Order
text_norm: 5 article 5 principal order amended substitution following paragraph (3) (3) number person appointed member regional assembly constituent local authority shall follows (a) (b) (c) (d) case council city dublin 7 case council county cork 5 case council city county limerick 4 one mayor case council county donegal dun laoghaire-rathdown fingal galway kerry kildare mayo meath south dublin tipperary wexford 3 (e) every case 2 each amendment article 60 principal order

title: (Alteration of Name and Department and Title of Minister) Order 2023 (S.I. No.
heading: 6. Article 60 of the Principal Order is amended by the substitution of the
text_raw:
6. Article 60 of the Principal Order is amended by the substitution of the 

following article: 

“(60) A regional assembly may, in accordance with such directions as 
may be given by the Minister to the regional assembly, pay to the 
Cathaoirleach of the assembly each year an allowance in respect 
of expenses reasonably incurred by him or her in connection with 
the performance of his or her functions during that year, except 
where the Cathaoirleach of the regional assembly is also the 
Mayor of Limerick.” 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [264] 

The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the making of the foregoing Order. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and Reform, 

28 May, 2024. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 May, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [264] 5

title: (Alteration of Name and Department and Title of Minister) Order 2023 (S.I. No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order amends 
(Regional Assemblies) 
the Local Government 
(Establishment) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 573 of 2014) to take account of the 
enactment of the Local Government (Mayor of Limerick) and Miscellaneous 
Provisions Act 2024 (No. 7 of 2024).
